title: Physics of Cognition
description: The course delves into perception, memory, and learning through physical principles. Students study cognition's physical basis, modern neural recording, and data interpretation.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PHYS 2212 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PSYC 2020 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
